title: Gran Turismo 7 - ONE YEAR LATER
description:
Gran Turismo 7 is now a game that really understands how to craft a core gameplay loop that’s sure to keep you engaged for hours and hours on end, and the developers’ sheer appreciation for the global car culture shines through every aspect of the experience, especially the campaign design. 

That dedication to crafting a game that caters to lovers of the sport, and the willingness to listen to the community and make changes within due time is what ultimately makes Gran Turismo 7 simply put, one hell of a game.

title: 16 Exciting Games of 2023 And Beyond That Have STEALTH ELEMENTS
description:
Stealth games have been a staple in the gaming industry for many years, capturing the hearts of gamers with their thrilling gameplay, captivating storylines, and heart-racing action. From the early days of Metal Gear Solid to the recent releases of games like Horizon Forbidden West, the genre has come a long way in terms of graphics, mechanics, and overall presentation. 

The adrenaline rush of sneaking past guards, executing silent takedowns, and making a clean escape is unmatched and has made stealth games a popular choice among gamers looking for a thrilling experience. With 16 exciting new upcoming games on the horizon that have stealth elements in them, it's an exciting time to be a fan of the genre.
